metadata.name: Potential Rundll32 Execution With DLL Stored In ADS
metadata.comment: Detects execution of rundll32 where the DLL being called is stored in an Alternate Data Stream (ADS).

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND process.cmd_line rlike '\[Rr\]\[Uu\]\[Nn\]\[Dd\]\[Ll\]\[Ll\]32\(\\.\[Ee\]\[Xx\]\[Ee\]\)? \\S\+?\\w:\\S\+?:')

output.summary: Detects execution of rundll32 where the DLL being called is stored in an Alternate Data Stream (ADS).
